events.message: I just received my order but the item is damaged and has multiple scratches on its surface.
The reported problem has been identified as a product defect due to damage and scratches.
Your case has been assigned to a specialist agent who will assist you further with the damaged product.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the scratches on your item. I’m here to help resolve this with you.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged item so we can assess the issue more accurately?
I have attached the pictures showing the scratches and damage clearly. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the photos. We can arrange a replacement shipment for you at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer.
I would like the replacement, please. Thank you for handling this quickly and professionally.
The replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within two business days with tracking details provided.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement item and that it meets your expectations.
Yes, I received the new item yesterday and it is in perfect condition. Thank you for your help!
We are glad to hear the replacement arrived in perfect condition. Closing the case now. Have a great day!
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey regarding your recent case with us.
